channel.title: Looking for a job as a penetration tester
channel.description:
Hi!
My name is Choi, I'm 30 years old, working as a system administrator, writing websites in my spare time. Stuck in the ceiling of the routine, caught in the ceiling of the salary at the main job, I want to change the field of activity (options - vorker and ubiver do not offer!). Who needs an assistant/partner whose glass is more than empty than full in regards to pentesting, or if there are uncomplicated tasks, I'm open to suggestions.
telegram - https://t.me/choi_penetration_t element - @mr_penetrationtester1967:matrix.org
Thanks for your consideration.

item.title: Looking for a job as a penetration tester
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a job as a penetration tester
